DataElement.preferredDefinition: The sum of all responses by an individual to the Fatigue Severity Scale (FSS).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A numeric scale to assess the severity of an individual's fatigue over the past week while performing a variety of usual tasks._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A numeric scale to assess the severity of an individual's fatigue over the past week while performing a variety of usual tasks.

Concepts.definition: A numeric scale to assess the severity of an individual's fatigue over the past week while performing a variety of usual tasks.

Property.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools
